member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.Utility.HexEncoding.GetBytes(System.String,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Creates a byte array from the hexadecimal string. Each two characters are combined to create one byte. First two hexadecimal characters become first byte in returned array. Non-hexadecimal characters are ignored.
member.param: string to convert to byte array
number of characters in string ignored
member.returns: byte array, in the same left-to-right order as the hexString

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.Utility.HexEncoding.InHexFormat(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if given string is in proper hexadecimal string format

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.Utility.HexEncoding.IsHexDigit(System.Char)
member.summary: Returns true is c is a hexadecimal digit (A-F, a-f, 0-9)
member.returns: true if hex digit, false if not

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.Utility.HexEncoding.HexToByte(System.String)
member.summary: Converts 1 or 2 character string into equivalant byte value
